entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 01:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -28.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.6°C
Wind: W 20 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
